item.title: The introduction of InboxRank is brought to you by Unified Inbox
item.description:
Unified Inbox has introduced InboxRank, a smart sorting tool designed to simplify communication management across various platforms such as email, social media, SMS, and instant messaging. Source: Unified Inbox. InboxRank prioritizes information by analyzing various factors related to individual user’s inbox activity. It continuously learns and adapts to user preferences over time. Key factors considered include: Communication frequency between the sender and receiver. The duration of their acquaintance (determined by the date of initial contact)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-introduction-of-inboxrank-is-brought-to-you-by-unified-inbox/
